arts.ttl: European football: Fiorentina dent Inter title hopes, Barça rout Valencia in cup
arts.sum: Inter beaten 3-0 and miss chance to go top of Serie A Ferran Torres hit hat-trick in 5-0 Copa del Rey victory Internazionale missed their chance to go top of Serie A , the defending champions suffering a 3-0 defeat at Fiorentina as Moise Kean scored twice for the hosts. The defeat left Inter in second place on 51 points, three behind the leaders, Napoli, and Fiorentina moved up to fourth on 42 points, above Lazio on goal difference. The original match on 1 December was suspended when Fiorentina’s Edoardo Bove collapsed on the pitch and was taken to hospital, and the game restarted at 0-0 in the 17th minute with a Fiorentina throw-in. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fiorentina Manager Palladino: “This is a Perfect, Magical Night” After 3-0 Win Over Inter
arts.sum: Fiorentina delivered a masterclass performance at the Stadio Artemio Franchi, defeating title contenders Inter Milan 3-0 in a rescheduled Serie A fixture. The victory propelled the Viola into the top four, prompting manager Raffaele Palladino to declare, "This is a perfect, magical night," while also urging caution. The post Fiorentina Manager Palladino: “This is a Perfect, Magical Night” After 3-0 Win Over Inter appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Kean Hits 20-Goal Milestone, Praises Fiorentina’s Family Atmosphere
arts.sum: Fiorentina's prolific striker Moise Kean has reached a remarkable personal milestone by scoring his 20th goal of the season in a stunning 3-0 victory over Inter Milan. The former Juventus forward expressed his gratitude and commitment to the club in a post-match interview with Dazn. The post Kean Hits 20-Goal Milestone, Praises Fiorentina’s Family Atmosphere appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Serie A | Fiorentina 3-0 Inter: Match Report
arts.sum: Fiorentina secured a stunning 3-0 victory against title contenders Inter at the Stadio Artemio Franchi, propelling them into the Serie A top four. The match, which resumed from its original December 1 start, lasted only 73 minutes of regular time due to its unusual circumstances.
